description: Test suite for singly linked list (SLL) implementation and its usage with various data types and custom nodes like IpCmaNode, including list operations such as addition, removal, concatenation, and iteration.

classes.name: SLL
classes.description: Singly linked list implementation supporting generic data types, with methods for adding, removing, iterating, and concatenating elements.

classes.name: LinkedListIterator
classes.description: Iterator class for traversing singly linked lists in both forward and reverse order.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: Template class representing a node in the linked list, encapsulating data and links.

classes.name: NodeLinks
classes.description: Template class managing links between nodes in the list.

classes.name: IpCmaNode
classes.description: Custom node class used in IPC related memory management, included via header.

methods.name: int testSLL(void)
methods.description: Main test function executing various linked list operations with different data types and testing features such as traversal, removal, concatenation, and custom node interactions.
